issue.title: [Release] Ensure that the JIRAs belonging the release's commits have the proper version number
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8045](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8045). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
And additionally the components set, this will help curating the tickets.
